Articles.Content: The Mk3 has one and I want to have a mercury craft too. I find it kinda sad that i have to use tweakscale to scale the larger one down.
I just build my own out of the cubic octagonal struts and a couple of Sepratrons. Does the trick just fine and even looks pretty Mercury-esque At least, in my opinion.

i want a red, mercury-like LES too !

By the way, why the hell do we get the LES before we get the corresponding Mk3 pod in the tech tree ?
Why do we get 2.5m decouples before we get 2.5 m parts? The new tech tree needs a LOT of revision......
